zone: Federally Administered Tribal Areas (وفاقی قبائلی علاقہ جات)
circumstances: En route from Kabul to Khost, the crew apparently got lost and the aircraft entered the Pakistan airspace without prior permission. The aircraft was shot down by the pilot of a Pakistan Air Force fighter air-air missile, entered a dive and crashed on the slope of a mountain located in the region of Parachinar. All 25 occupants were killed.
probable_cause: Shot down by the pilot of a Pakistan Air Force fighter.
